alert.note: Alert for Hardee; Highlands; Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 2:13PM EDT until June 22 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Ruskin has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Highlands County in south central Florida... Northeastern Hardee County in central Florida... Southeastern Polk County in central Florida... * Until 245 PM EDT. * At 212 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Avon Park, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lake Wales, Avon Park, Crooked Lake Park, Frostproof, Hillcrest Heights, Highland Park, Indian Lake Estates, Avon Park Executive Airport, Lake Wales Municipal Airport, and Babson Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
